title: Surface Chemistry Regulated Gradient Multi-Component Solid Electrolyte Interphase for 460 Wh kg-1 Lithium Metal Pouch Cell
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02311K, Paper
Man Pang, Zhongwei Jiang, Chongyang Luo, Ziqing Yao, Tianji Fu, Tao Pan, Qingpeng Guo, Yujie Li, Shizhao Xiong, ChunMan Zheng, Weiwei Sun, Guangmin Zhou, Shuangke Liu
Lithium (Li) metal is an ideal anode for high energy density rechargeable Li batteries. However, parasitic reactions and uneven native oxide layer on surface led to uncontrollable Li deposition and...
